summary: Young people exploring a cave in Hawaii fall into a hole, and wind up in the lost city of Atlantis.
cast: Nicola Cowper|Ilan Mitchell-Smith|Paul Carafotes|Janie du Plessis|Jeff Celentano|Jaclyn Bernstein|Kathy Ireland|Lochner de Kock|Simon Poland|Jeremy Crutchley|Albert Maritz|Russel Savadier|Lynda Marshall|Myra Chasen|Marius Du Plooy|James Lithgow|Liesel van den Bergh|Erika Delport|Janine Bonollo|Charlotte Stewart|Peter Henry Schroeder|Sydney Radebe|Sonto Ndlovu|Solly Ndlovu|Emo Philips|Beany Chopper|Rolf Fleischmann|Steve Fuji
title: Viaje al centro de la tierra
